title: Australian Dollar remains steady following China NBS PMI
description: The Australian Dollar (AUD) inches higher against the US Dollar (USD), holding ground for the second successive session. Volumes are expected to be thin due to the New Year's holiday in Australia.
content:

The Australian Dollar (AUD) inches higher against the US Dollar (USD), holding ground for the second successive session. Volumes are expected to be thin due to the New Year's holiday in Australia.

The [AUD/USD](https://www.fxstreet.com/currencies/audusd) pair moves little following the release of China’s official Manufacturing Purchasing Managers' Index (PMI), which rose to 50.1 in December, compared to 49.2 in the previous reading. The reading came in above the market consensus of 49.2 in the reported month. The NBS Non-Manufacturing PMI climbed t
